Articles.Content:
I'd like to introduce myself. I am Redwork. I don't generally buy games before trying them, and this one was no exception. I torrented v0.22 to see if I would like the full game. I DID! So when I found out that there was a 0.23 version, it was time to ante up, give back to the developers, and vote with my dollars.

I really appreciate what Squad has done, and I love the direction that this is going. There's a HUGE learning curve for someone with basically no background in physics, aerospace, or flight simulators. My favorite part? Designing effective and efficient vessels!

Keep up the phenomenal work guys. I may end up developing some mod packs of my own!

Cheers

- Redwork

Welcome to the party!

The game's even better when you have people to share it with, and this community forum is one of the friendliest forums around.
